text: Mayfield is an unincorporated community in Hancock County, Georgia, United States on the outskirts of its primary city Sparta. ==History== Mayfield was named after the estate of a local judge. The Shivers-Simpson House, also known as "Rock Mill", south of Mayfield along Mayfield Rd., is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. ==References== Category:Populated places established in 1970 Category:Unincorporated communities in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Unincorporated communities in Hancock County, Georgia
title: Mayfield, Georgia
